text: The 1999 Pacific Curling Championships were held from December 9 to 12 in Tokoro, Hokkaido, Japan. Japan won the men's event over Australia (it was the first Pacific title for the Japanese men). On the women's side, Japan defeated South Korea in the final (it was the eighth Pacific title for the Japanese women). By virtue of winning, the Japanese men's team and the Japanese women's team qualified for the 2000 World and Curling Championships in Glasgow, Scotland. ==Men== ===Teams=== {| class="wikitable" !
